text:
Local governments are on the front lines of climate change. That's why we're defending the Clean Power Plan. 
https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/energy-environment/wp/2016/12/29/withdrawing-obama-climate-plan-would-lead-to-more-litigation-ags-warn-trump/?utm_term=.b9d1a10b570a&wpisrc=nl_green&wpmm=1 …

text:
